Description: The Company for Cooperative Insurance (known as: Tawuniya) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 2005. Tawuniya operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has companies operating across Bahrain and Saudi Arabia, working on Multi-Sector Holdings, Real Estate Development, IT Consulting and Other Services and Property and Casualty Insurance. Tawuniya is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1986.

Shareholder Name: General Organization for Social Insurance - Saudi Arabia
